column1: Erasmus Mundus Master of Science in Public Sector Innovation and eGovernance (Leuven)
column5: Responding to the growing need for professionals in eGovernance and digitalization in the public sector, this unique, interuniversity and interdisciplinary programme empowers students to become specialists that combine competencies on public administration and public management with expertise on information systems and
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
